item.title: Facebook is Rolling Out Hyper-Local Targeting For Businesses
item.description:
Facebook is Rolling Out Hyper-Local Targeting For Businesses

Facebook is doing something you'd never expect: it's using location-based targeting to help you find nearby businesses in your area. As in, your immediate area. The search giant released a beta version of its service to help users find businesses that are near their physical location, as well as advertising local businesses.

item.title: How to Boost Facebook Likes for Free...
item.description:
How to Boost Facebook Likes for Free...

Want to drive more "likes" to your Facebook page? Below are 3 different routes you can take to accomplish this. Did Fresh Crowd create your page and get you started on daily posting? We get asked all of the time, "how can I boost my business facebook likes organically?"
